justification: “For each profile, participants answered the question ‘To what extent do you believe this user is an expert on the topic of COVID-19 vaccination?’ on a six-point… scale from ‘not at all’… to ‘very much’.”
“For vaccination attitudes, participants rated nine statements from a COVID-19 Vaccine Hesitancy Scale (VHS; Grossman-Giron et al., 2023) on a five-point scale…”
“For political orientation, we used an adapted measure from the American National Election Studies (ANES)… a 7-point scale from ‘extremely liberal’… to ‘extremely conservative’.”
“Participants were asked ‘What is your COVID-19 vaccination status?’ and chose from [a list of vaccination status response options].”
